title: High-Quality Copra from Southeast Sulawesi
content: We supply selected copra from the best coconuts. Export-ready dried copra for food, cosmetics, and pharmaceutical industries. Guaranteed quality direct from local farms.

title: Virgin Coconut Oil for All Uses
content: Processed naturally with no chemicals. Our coconut oil is perfect for consumption, beauty, and industrial needs. Delivered fresh with high quality standards.

title: Eco-Friendly Coconut Shell
content: Alternative fuel and craft material. Our coconut shells are great for briquettes, organic fertilizer, or creative industry needs. Sustainable supply available.

title: Fresh Coconuts Ready to Process
content: Selected coconuts from the best farms. Thick meat, rich taste, and fresh quality, perfect for household use, traditional food, or food business supply.
